TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FeatureSupport extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport
Public MustInherit Class FeatureSupport Implements IFeatureSupport
public ref class FeatureSupport abstract : System::Windows::Forms::IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供用于从当前系统中检索功能信息的 方法。

span.span: Provides methods for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `static`当查询功能信息的类实现接口时，请使用此类的方法 。Use the `static` methods of this class when the classes you query for feature information implement the interface. 否则，从继承， 并提供您自己的实现。Otherwise, inherit from and provide your own implementation. 有关此类的实现，请参见 。For an implementation of this class, see . 若要获取功能的版本号，请调用 。To get the version number of a feature, call . 调用 以确定是否安装了某个功能的特定功能。Call to determine if a particular feature or version of a feature is installed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和查询来实现该 功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为 `null` ，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定已 `textBox1` 创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 当从继承时 ，必须重写 方法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the method.

para.span: 重写此方法时，请检查用于参数的类 是否与方法中用于此参数的类相同 。

span.span: When you override this method, check that the class that you use for the parameter is the same as the class used for this parameter in the method.

para.span: 如果这两个 参数不同，则还必须重写 。

span.span: If the two parameters differ, you also must override .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Version GetVersionPresent (object feature);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version
public: abstract Version ^ GetVersionPresent(System::Object ^ feature);
abstract member GetVersionPresent : obj -> Version

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.

summary.span: 当在一个派生类中被重写后，获取系统中可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: ，表示系统中可用的指定功能的版本号；如果未安装此功能，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成：主要版本号、次要版本号和内部版本号。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 版本号通常显示为 "主编号. 次要版本号. 内部版本号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和查询 功能。The following code example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为 `null` ，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码要求已 `textBox1` 创建并放置在窗体上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: 如果系统上有可用的指定功能的版本号，则为 ；如果未安装该功能，则为 。

span.span: A with the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成：主要版本号、次要版本号和内部版本号。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 版本号通常显示为 "主编号. 次要版本号. 内部版本号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". 请参阅包含此功能的产品的文档，以确定要传递给 `featureClassName` 和参数的名称 `featureConstName` 。See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.

summary.span: 确定系统中是否安装了指定的功能。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is installed in the system.

span.span: The feature to look for.

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: 表示要查找功能的最小版本号。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 确定系统中是否安装了指定功能的指定版本或较新版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.

returns.span: 如果提供该功能，并且其版本号大于或等于指定的最小版本号，则为 ；如果未安装该功能或者其版本号低于指定的最小版本号，则为 。

span.span: if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.

span.span: if the specified feature is present; if the specified feature is not present or if the product containing the feature is not installed.
